title: GTA 6 Tease, GTA Online PS5 Release Date - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.04.22
description:
Married to the Games' Gabe Patillo joins Greg to talk about a bevy of GTA news, Pokemon Legends Arceus' success, and PSVR2's web site! 

Follow Gabe: https://twitter.com/gabepatillo

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:30 - Housekeeping
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Gordon McGuire,James Davis (@JamesDavisMakes),Pranksy, Manny The Bagel boy Sanchez, & Black Jack
The Roper Report  -
00:05:50 - GTA 6 Tease, GTA Online PS5 Release Date - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.04.22, Rockstar
00:20:28 - Pokemon Legends Arceus is HUGE in America
00:33:30 - PSVR’s Website is Live
00:42:15 - Ad
00:43:26 - Naughty Dog is hiring for LOTS of roles
00:48:20 - Saudi Government Invests in Capcom, Nexon, Matthew Martin and Gearoid Reidy @ Bloomberg
0051:20: - How Big Dat Steam Deck? Billy Givens
00:57:50 - Out today
Tomorrow’s Hosts:
MON: Blessing and Tim
TUE: Greg and Gary
WED: Blessing and VGC’s Jordan Middler
THURS: Greg and Tim
FRI: Blessing and Erin Ashley Simon
